casebody.data:
October 23, 1950. No. 19. Gara v. United States. Argued October 13, 16, 1950.

Decided October 23, 1950.

Francis Heisler argued the cause for petitioner. With him on the brief was Stanley U. Robinson, Jr. John W. MacDonald was also of counsel. Philip R. Monahan argued the cause for the United States. With him on the brief *858were Solicitor General Perlman, Assistant Attorney General Mclnerney, Stanley M. Silverberg and Robert S. Erdahl. *857 Per Curiam:

The judgment is affirmed by an equally divided Court.

Mr. Justice Clark took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
